title: silver player can do this???

embed.description: Pip4nik / Bronze 2 37LP / 31W 4L Win Ratio 89% / Orianna - 10W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Ezreal - 5W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Graves - 4W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Miss Fortune - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Master Yi - 2W 0L Win Ratio 100%

body: umm? climbing from the inner core

replies.body: He is a silver smurf and is showing off on the forums... That's all.

stats are only one part of it, to me its your results inclusive of the team over all.  look at the game overviews, you can see where others lost and how it flows onto their team mates (allowing for roaming) and where team don't feed or have carried and resulted in their win.

From the looks of it, it seems like someone who is actually pretty decent ended up mucking up their first ever promos (this is the first time they have ever played ranked -- there is nothing for seasons 5 or 6) and got placed in Bronze 2, even though they probably play at a higher skill level. That, or the account somehow had a Bronze 5 mmr, the person went 10-0 or 9-0 in their promos and got Bronze 2 (but once again should be a higher rank).

I doubt the account is being boosted since it's never been used to play ranked before, but it could have been sold.

Or the person simply might be lucky. I'm Bronze 4 and at one point I had a 90+% win-rate over ~25 games. That's what got me from Bronze 5 0 LP to Bronze 4 90 LP.
He has a 100% win-rate on several champions (but some are only over 1-3 games), and has an 89% win-rate in Bronze over 35 games.
